feature_description: Compose an email with formatting (bold, italic, lists)
prompt: Go to Gmail. Compose an email to team@mycompany.com with the subject 'Weekly Progress Report'. In the email, make the project name 'Q3 Marketing Campaign' bold, italicize the deadline 'June 30, 2023', and include a bulleted list with the following completed tasks: 'Updated website content', 'Created social media graphics', and 'Finalized email templates'.
expected_behaviour: The agent should open Gmail, create a new email with the specified recipient and subject line, and compose a professional message that includes: the project name "Q3 Marketing Campaign" in bold text, the date "June 30, 2023" in italic text, and a properly formatted bulleted list of the three specified completed tasks.
